item.description:
Please spread the word and invite everyone you know. The kids need our help!

TO GET TICKETS CALL 860-243-1806 RIGHT AWAY. BE SURE TO TELL THEM YOU ARE WITH CARYL'S MEETUP GROUP!!

You are cordially invited to attend

Dancing with Covenant Stars

a fundraiser to benefit
Covenant to Care for Children
on Friday, November 7, 2008
at The Goodwin Hotel in Hartford, Connecticut



Join us for a jazz cocktail reception and silent auction, gourmet
dinner and wine, and a celebrity dance contest that will trip your
light fantastic! your votes (and your dollars) will determine the
winning celebrity dance couple. Afterwards, you can show your own
star moves on the dance floor until the wee hours of the night.

7:00 jazz cocktail reception and silent auction
8:00 dinner
8:30 the show begins


Black-tie suggested


Master of Ceremonies:

Al Terzi, WFSB, Eyewitness News 3, News Anchor

The Stars:

Teresa LaBarbera, WFSB, Eyewitness News 3, Traffic Reporter
Mark Mitchell, Mitchell Autogroup
Steven Mitchell, Minister of Music & Arts, Asylum Hill Congregational Church
Surprise Contestant

The Judges:

Mayor Mike, the Nighttime Mayor of Hartford
Hugh Russell, restaurateur (The Russell)
Iris Watkins, Miss Connecticut Teen America 2008

Menu:

Spinach Salad

Choice of:

Grilled Sirloin with blackberry cabernet sauce

Roasted Salmon with pomegranate butter sauce

Vegetable Spring Rolls with pineapple mango salsa

Assorted pastries for dessert

Coffee and wine

Cash Bar



Dancing With Covenant Stars
item.how_to_find_us: We will reserve a MeetUp Cooking Club Table if we get 10 folk coming.
item.name: Dancing With Covenant Stars benefit
